title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 2 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
December 20, 2018
On Thursday, December 20, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 2, the “Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018,” which Extends, expands, or modifies Federal agriculture and nutrition programs, including the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP), farm income support, crop insurance, conservation, credit assistance, agriculture trade assistance, research, international food aid, rural development, and other programs through fiscal year 2023.
